root.name: UFO: Aftermath
root.description: Background StoryIn 2004 an UFO approached Earth. It began to release giant clouds of alien spores into the upper atmosphere that stayed there like clouds. The spores eventually multiplied until they covered the entire Earth throwing and blocked out the sun, casting the animals of Earth into darkness. This would eventually be called the "Twilight" by those who would survive.The spores, after multiplying many times, began falling to Earth. They began to smother everything and everyone on Earth. Most life was wiped out during this period which came to be know as "Nightfall". The governments did nothing, hoping to not provoke the alien like substance. Unfortunately this was their downfall as the end came all to quickly. Numerous humans however did survive, living out the months underground until the spores seemed to dissolve and decompose.
